author: Péter Madai
comment: Really cool colors and design. I wish it could be adapted to square watches, too, plus a battery indicator would be nice.  Also, I noticed a significant battery drain when using it on my watch (Smartwatch 3), mainly with the screen always on (compared to other calendar-enabled watch faces with screen on).

author: Tom Bar-Gal
comment: A very pretty watch face. Has a problem with rtl events. I would also like to see current event in digital mode and current event's start time on the arc (not just remaining).
title: Nice design, needs some changes

author: dean hodgkins
comment: Not sure if it's a wear problem, or this app, but temperature will revert to Celsius occasionally... Also, i wish all the weather and calendar stuff showed in the same face.  But still, a great watch face.

reply.author: Fluid Interaction
reply.content: Hmm. Temperature thingy sounds like a bug! Thanks for reporting.

title: Great app!

author: Uzair Farooqui
comment: Weather face is useless, does not show any weather details. Rest is good. needs a background that can give it a 3D kind of look rather than the vanila flat background.

author: Alex Spenceriffic
comment: Has all the relevant info you might need, with the exception of notifications (nudge nudge, wink wink, say no more say no more)

reply.author: Fluid Interaction
reply.content: Say no more, we here you! Let's see what we can come up with notifications.

title: Best watch face I have so far found

author: Wolfe Dave
comment: Worked great on my Gear S2 as watcher. Cant even get it to work on the Gear S2 and they removed the watcher program.  Worthless app for Gear2.

author: Nik Friedman TeBockhorst
comment: There's a number of watch faces that have analog indicators of upcoming events. This one does a very nice job of displaying these stylishly and clearly, and overall looks like a smart and professional face.
title: On time and prepared

author: Mark Tredway
comment: Would be great if you all could add ability to see steps. For me linked to google fit. Much appreciated.
title: Very simple clean and cool...but

author: Ausama S.
comment: Please, needed support on gearS NEO again.. I installed this app but it does not interact with old Watcher app anymore! Will you make this tizen app again?
title: Watcher>AIKA

author: Darren Burke
comment: It would be good to have the watch battery level displayed. And maybe include the wind as well in the weather face (somehow!)
title: Nice clever watch face

author: Gabriel Kalil
comment: The best watch face I had, pretty convenient, gets you the right information right in time. It makes my watch really smart.

author: Ferdinand Quist
comment: Really great and functional watch face. Would be even better if it allowed for more customization!
title: Wish I found this sooner!

author: bá học nguyễn
comment: It's look like watcher on tizen os, the watch face i like most. Tks u.

author: Gary Baxter
comment: Everything is in the right position
title: This is the slam dunk!

author: Joshua Gilbert
comment: I can't get my calendar

author: Mateusz Kruszyk
comment: Nice design. Hourly weather forecasts are really useful.
title: Great watch face

author: Janne Lautanala
comment: hieno toteutus,  suosittelen!
title: hieno

author: Saurav Bhuju
comment: I wish I could change color in background.
title: Almost perfect

author: Mark Reisch
comment: Exactly the watch face I have been looking for!
title: Perfect!

author: Douglas Moat
comment: Nice looking face
title: Good stuff.

author: AHMED GHEITH
comment: Cool watch face

author: Ronald Lukander
comment: To change watch face you'll need Android Wear 1.3 (or later) on watch.

author: Lech Deregowski
comment: Looks OK, leaves an app stub in the drawer which I find annoying.
title: App stubs

author: Risvi Yoosuf
comment: Tried to change watch face but it always back to default face...

reply.author: Fluid Interaction
reply.content: Ah. This might be because of miscommunication from our side. All three watch faces are always "active" on watch and you simply switch between them by tapping the screen. Selecting watch from settings application doesn't change face from the watch. Also note that you need Android Wear 1.3 or later for interactive watch faces to work.

title: Can't choose different watch
